welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Menlo Park, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We invite you to explore our city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Palo Alto Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Terminal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Air Terminal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Half Moon Airport houses all major airlines and services for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Half Moon Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Metropolitan Oak International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Metropolitan Oak International Airport, primarily serving regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Reid-Hillview Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Reid-Hillview Airport is exclusively for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Livermore Airport houses the ticketing counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Livermore Airport serves private and charter flights, offering amenities such as lounges and concierge services.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
